meanings.definition: The state or condition of being complete.
meanings.sent1: The completenesses of the puzzle made me feel accomplished.
meanings.sent2: She felt a sense of satisfaction when she reached the completenesses of her project.
meanings.sent3: The completenesses of the jigsaw puzzle brought a smile to her face.
meanings.sent4: His happiness was like the completenesses of a finished painting.
meanings.sent5: The completenesses of the book's ending left her feeling content.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being whole or entire.
meanings.sent1: The completenesses of the circle made it perfect.
meanings.sent2: The completenesses of the team's effort led to success.
meanings.sent3: The completenesses of the cake made it irresistible.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt the completenesses of love enveloping her.
meanings.sent5: The completenesses of the melody touched his soul deeply.

meanings.definition: The state of being fully realized or achieved.
meanings.sent1: The completenesses of his dream finally came true.
meanings.sent2: The completenesses of her goals were a result of hard work.
meanings.sent3: The completenesses of the plan left everyone impressed.
meanings.sent4: His smile showed the completenesses of his happiness.
meanings.sent5: The completenesses of the project's success were evident to all.
